artist: Author: Aja Waalwijk; Publisher: ALLey Publications, New York
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, image of a man (the author) staring up at a sign post two or three times his height that gives directions to more than several places, with text on an otherwise blank cover; 32 pp.
medium: Letterpress, black-and-white offset lithography; bound volume
title: The Emerging Network of Autonomous Zones
